description:
'''Alvin Lamar Worthy''' (born July 27, 1982), known professionally as '''Westside Gunn''', is an American [[Rapping|rapper]] and fashion designer. He co-founded the [[Independent record label|hip-hop record label]] [[Griselda Records]] in 2012 with his paternal half-brother [[Conway the Machine]] and their cousin and fellow rapper [[Benny the Butcher]].

Since 2005, he has released five studio albums in addition to a wide catalog of [[mixtape]]s and [[extended play]]s. Gunn was affiliated with [[Shady Records]] from 2017 to 2020, but has since returned to independent work.
